Params: {1: '1', 3: "You are now approaching the chemical plant's exit. Lucia is looking around and seems absent-minded."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm sorry. This place seems very familiar, but I just don't remember it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's my personal issue. I can't make the rest of the team do this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It might also lead us to clues about the Ascendants.', 3: '10'}
